short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to automate copy and paste from EHRs to clinic forms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Standard Care Companion**

🎁 **Elevate Your Practice with Standard Care Companion PRO**

Join the ranks of healthcare professionals benefiting from our advanced features and exclusive offers, all at no cost.

📋 **Streamlined Prior Authorizations**

Simplify the prior authorization process. Standard Care Companion PRO empowers you to expedite consultation requests, removing administrative burdens. It's a hassle-free way to ensure your patients receive timely care.

🔒 **HIPAA-Compliant Data Security**

Patient data privacy is paramount. Standard Care Companion PRO guarantees HIPAA compliance and top-level data security, so you can confidently coordinate care while protecting your patients' sensitive information.

🚀 **Accelerate Patient Care**

Enhance your practice's efficiency and patient satisfaction with Standard Care Companion PRO. Join the healthcare coordination revolution and provide top-notch care with our premium extension.

🌟 **Seamless Personalization for Patients**

Deliver personalized healthcare experiences. Standard Care Companion PRO enables you to tailor your recommendations for patients, ensuring they receive care that aligns with their unique needs and preferences.

🚫 **AdBlock and Privacy Protection**
Privacy-respecting extension, no intrusive tracking.

(Note: Data privacy and security are our top priorities. Any data collected by this extension is handled with the utmost care and in full compliance with all relevant regulations.)

Feel free to use this updated version, and if you have any further requests or need additional assistance, please let me know.
